radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis, no pleural effusion, extensive coronary artery calcifications, minimal dilation of the common bile duct measuring up to 7 mm, normal pancreas and liver with no focal lesions, bilateral simple cortical cysts in kidneys.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Similar to prior, a large posterior osteophyte at L2-3 results in moderate to severe canal narrowing.
